ocean.question: I am big and blue. Fishies swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 Boats sail on top of me!

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and say 'glub glub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I like to swim with my friends!

ocean.question: I'm on the beach and have shells. You can build me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪣 You use a bucket and shovel on me!
🏰 You can make a castle with me!

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk slowly on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can hide inside my home!
🐾 I leave tracks in the sand!

ocean.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?
I fly over the sea and like to eat fish. What am I?
I'm a big sea animal that blows water in the air. What am I?
I have a pointy nose and like to jump out of the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏊 I love to swim and play.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in a coral reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Other little fishes swim near me.

ocean.question: I have a big shell and hide in it when I'm scared on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 My house is on my back.

transport.question: I go vroom vroom! I have four wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry your whole family.

transport.question: I float on water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I need an anchor so I don't float away.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ People travel on me to faraway places.
🦅 Birds don't travel on me, but I fly similar to them.

transport.question: I am big and red. I help put out fires. What am I?
I go on a track. I am long and carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 You have to wait at the rail crossing when I'm coming

transport.question: I have two wheels. You pedal with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ It's good to wear a helmet when riding me.
🤸 I can help you learn balance.
🚲 I don't need gas to go!

transport.question: I take people all over the city. I stop at bus stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 Lots of people can ride me at once.
🛑 I pick up and drop off people.
🗺️ I follow a set route around a city.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt. I have a siren and flashing lights. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I take people to the hospital.
🚨 You need to get out of my way when you see me coming.

transport.question: I take people high up a mountain! I hang from a cable. What am I?

hints.text: 🏔️ I give you a great view.
❄️ You might see snow where I take you.

transport.question: I go under the sea! I have windows so you can see the fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 You can see coral reefs from inside me.
🤿 You don't need to know how to dive to see under the ocean with me
